text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-orderableDrugForm where concept is-a _GasDrugForm

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-orderableDrugForm
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _GasDrugFormGasDrugFormAny elastic aeriform fluid in which the molecules are separated from one another and have free paths.

name: GasDrugForm
title: GasDrugForm
description: Any elastic aeriform fluid in which the molecules are separated from one another and have free paths.
